Description: Mould-made pottery lamp decorated on the discus with Eros kneeling on an altar (?), holding an amphora. The shoulder is decorated with tendrils in relief, interrupted by a rectangular panel. At the rear is a notched ring handle. Within the base-ring is an impressed bound triple branch.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2052.bis)
